project_name.justification: The primary project of interest is specified as Daneros, and the document confirms this: 'Consolidated Uranium Announces Drill Results from Daneros and Rim Mines' and 'Drilling Results from the Daneros Mine'.

company_name.justification: The press release is issued by 'Consolidated Uranium Inc. (“CUR”, the “Company”, “Consolidated Uranium”) (TSXV: CUR) (OTCQX: CURUF)', which is identified as the operator and acquirer of the new claims. This directly contradicts the authoritative metadata.

ceo_buyer.justification: The buyer is Consolidated Uranium Inc. and the text states: 'Philip Williams, Chairman and CEO commented...'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text describes the staking of new claims and acquisition of leases, which typically implies 100% interest, but no specific percentage of ownership interest acquired is mentioned in the document.

primary_commodity.justification: The text repeatedly refers to uranium, for example: '...at its past-producing Daneros and Rim uranium and vanadium mines...' and provides assay results in '% U3O8'.

verified_article_link.justification: No article link was provided in the source text.

currency.justification: The text does not mention any financial consideration for the acquisition of the new claims or leases.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any cash payments for the acquisition of the new claims or leases.

share_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any share payments for the acquisition of the new claims or leases.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The text does not mention any combined cash and share payments for the acquisition of the new claims or leases.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The text does not mention any shares being issued as part of the transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any share warrant payments.

option_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any option payments.

issued_share_price.justification: The text does not mention any shares being issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The document reports on completed drilling programs, but does not mention any future exploration commitments in terms of meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The document does not mention any future financial exploration commitments.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text explicitly states that for the new claims, there are no royalty obligations: 'The new mining claims staked by CUR are not subject to any underlying agreements and do not carry any royalty obligations.'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text specifies the area acquired related to the Daneros project: 'At the Daneros Mine... the Company staked 33 new unpatented lode mining claims covering an area of approximately 670 acres.'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the acquired area at Daneros is specified as acres: '...covering an area of approximately 670 acres.'

resource_size.justification: The text explicitly states in the forward-looking information section that there are 'no known mineral reserves or resources'.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified as Consolidated Uranium Inc., and its ticker and exchange are provided in the text: 'Consolidated Uranium Inc. (“CUR”, the “Company”, “Consolidated Uranium”) (TSXV: CUR) (OTCQX: CURUF)'.
